text: The Crystal City (2003) is an alternate history/fantasy book that is written by Orson Scott Card. It is the sixth book in Card's The Tales of Alvin Maker series and is about Alvin Miller, the seventh son of a seventh son (which gives him magical powers). == Other websites== * * About the novel The Crystal City from Card's website Category:2003 books Category:The Tales of Alvin Maker
title: The Crystal City
